text: allahu ettu inakale srsticcu. cem'mariyatu vargattil ninn rantum kealatu vargattil ninn rantum. ceadikkuka: allahu avayil anvargatteyanea nisid'dhamakkiyat; atea penvargatteyea? atumallenkil irutaram pennatukaluteyum garbhasayannalilulla kuttikaleyea? arivinre atisthanattil enikku parannutarika; ninnal satyasandharenkil
